amendment.description: To improve the Indian Economic Development Feasibility Study.

vote.text: Amendment SA 905 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 905 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hoeven. (consideration: CR S4650; text: CR S4650) To improve the Indian Economic Development Feasibility Study.
